About

Woodworking goes way back to my childhood building jigsaw puzzles out of scraps from my Dad's rubbermaid bin full of cuttings in the basement. I progressed to speaker cabinets in highschool, and wine racks in college and then built nothing for a decade or more. It was only recently that I found real purpose and reward again in designing and building my own pieces of furniture. Our house has slowly become furnished with my pieces and it seems time to share the love of the craft.

Hopefully you enjoy what you see here. Please contact me using any of the methods below with any questions, thoughts or ideas.

Finally, I would like to dedicate the woodworking dream to an old 'Mainer' whose woodworking passion was strong, and whose simple pine bookshelf still stands in my daughters bedroom. Thanks for reawakening an old passion Cabot.
